name: Whiteboard - Teams Templates
description:
A comprehensive set of different Whiteboard templates for brainstorming, team management, strategy and mapping.


v 1.3 updates

Team Management / Agile:

  • Sailboat Retrospective
  • Starfish Retrospective


Strategy and planning:

  • Strategic Planning Board


Brainstorming:

  • Feedback Action Plan (FAP)
  • Jobs-to-be-done Canvas
  • The Customer Question Board

Strategy & Planning:

  • Likert Scale
  • 5 Whys
  • Porter's Five Forces
